text: (dutare,) naviga nimage satyaviruva granthavannu ilisi kottiruvevu. Idu (gatakalada) granthada paiki janara bali ulidiruvudannu samarthisuva mattu adannu kapaduva granthavagide. Nivinnu allahanu ilisiruva niyama prakarave avara naduve tirpu nidiri. Nim'ma balige satyavu bandiruvaga, nivu avara apeksegalannu anusarisabedi. Navu nim'ma paiki pratiyobbarigu (pratiyondu samudayakku) nirdista niyama hagu dariyondannu nigadi padisiddeve. Allahanu bayasiddare nim'mellarannu onde samudaya vagisuttiddanu. Adare avanu, nimage enannu nidiruvano adara mulakave nim'mannu pariksisabayasuttane. Niviga olitinalli paraspara spardhisiri.
